text: Norvik is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Erling Johannes Norvik (1899-1964), Norwegian politician * Erling Norvik (1928-1998), Norwegian politician * Harald Norvik (born 1946), Norwegian businessman ==See also== * Norvik Banka, previous name of PNB Banka, Latvian bank * Norvik press, founded by James McFarlane * Nordvik (disambiguation)
title: Norvik
